summary_md: Bosnia and Herzegovina's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 6,698 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with a moderate inflation rate of 1.69% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG). The unemployment rate stands at 10.72% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), while the average life expectancy is 77.85 years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN). The country has a significant internet user base, accounting for 83.40% (IT.NET.USER.ZS) of the population.
